Sup everyone!

So we all know that Squiffy is a great software and finds its charm in its simplicity. The ability to collapse sections and passages helps to keep your work organized.

So what if you could select a bunch of sections/passages to collapse into a chapter?

If any of you have used Inform, you know what I am talking about. It's just another simple organizational tool.

Maybe you can choose only to display one specific chapter or all of the chapters together.

If anything, I want to ensure that the online Squiffy editor is back up and running before this feature request even gets considered. We all love Squiffy and await its happy return!

-Broadwaydude
